channel.title: Much Appreciated
channel.description:
Hello everybody reading this... I'm a semi-new member to this community (This is a new account) and I'm really interested in learning a lot about how the coding is actually written from scratch.. to be honest prior to this i was just dling sources and editing small things of course like moving teleports.. texts.. all that noob stuff ect... but I'm looking for someone who would be able to spend some time and teach me how to write simple programs and how to incorporate what I know into writing my own RSPS framework and that sort of stuff...
Thank you, any help is much appreciated... Skype Name: Channlawrence

item.title: Much Appreciated
